en.title: Renew ${product_name} Pro Account
en.e_intro: Dear ${user_display_name}, your Pro account will expire on ${expires_date}, you can renew now. ${product_name} will become better and better together with you.

zh.title: ${product_name}高级账户续费提醒
zh.e_title: 您的高级账户即将到期
zh.e_intro: 亲爱的${user_display_name}，您的高级账户将于${expires_date}到期。立即续费即可延长有效期，并发现越来越好的${product_name}。
